title: Most comfortable panties EVER!!!!
content: I'm 5'6, 150 lbs. Got Mediums. These are the most comfortable panties EVER! It feels like wearing nothing. They're super soft and thin/breathable. They don't dig into the crack, excellent quality, the high waist is not super high, just enough it doesn't sit right in my Mom belly roll. They don't ride up or down or roll at all. Perfect panties!

title: Vibrant Colors and Patterns, Comfortable Material
content: And I say that because virtually all of my thongs are not "low-rise" but certainly not high-waisted as these are. They are incredibly comfortable, and the fabric has a slight texture to it, I guess what makes them "breathable" as it says in the description. They're nice and silky, lay flat again the skin and are SUPER comfortable. No bunching, no rolling, very lightweight. They launder well and I just love them. I got the Basics (gray/navy/white/beige/black) in a size Small. I'm 5'3", 110 lbs. and petite. Very happy with them and will likely order other colors.

title: Silky smooth comfort
content: I ordered the floral pack in size medium. I'm 5'8" 125lbs and medium fit comfortably, could have done small if I wanted a tighter fit. The fabric is stretchy and has mesh holes throughout to make it breathable. There is a cotton lined gusset at the crotch area and the sides do have seams, but they are fairly flat and not scratchy. I've worn these on a hot summer day outside and they don't trap the sweat like a lot of these stretchy fabrics do. Overall, comfy and true to size, or size down.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2024
